name: TRANSITION (16 bit)
description:
Responding to a song and visual explanation belonging to Lucy enigma (ASTERASPACE & APLUS) entitled "TRANSITION" which was originally recorded on the blockchain on January 9, 2022.

With the original musical elements that tend to be analog, it gave me an idea to respond to "Transition" into classical chiptune music along with 16 bit pixel art visuals, which aims to make LUCY ENIGMA connoisseurs enjoy this work in a (not so) new and different atmosphere.

details:
16 bit pixel art (100x100. 8 fps)
music 01:01:00
completely done using Nintendo DSi XL (2009 console), Wario ware D.I.Y app.
